pymlgen.data_analysis package¶

Submodules¶

pymlgen.data_analysis.clustering module¶

pymlgen.data_analysis.clustering.choose_geometries(list_of_molecules, feature='fingerprint', maximum_number_of_seeds=8)¶
pymlgen.data_analysis.clustering.generate_labels(dt)¶

Try many algorithms for clustering one after the other. :param dt: data for clustering as np.array :return: list of labels

pymlgen.data_analysis.clustering.get_labels(data_as_list, algorithm='combo')¶
pymlgen.data_analysis.clustering.get_the_best_molecule(list_of_molecules)¶

Give a list of molecule objects with name and energy, and this function returns the molecule with lower energy :type list_of_molecules: list of Molecule objects

pymlgen.data_analysis.clustering.main()¶
pymlgen.data_analysis.clustering.memoize(f)¶

Memoization decorator for functions taking one or more arguments. https://code.activestate.com/recipes/578231-probably-the-fastest-memoization-decorator-in-the-/

pymlgen.data_analysis.clustering.n_clusters_optimized_with_kmeans(dt)¶
